body.name: The Original Popco Silicone Microwave Popcorn Popper with Handles, Silicone Popcorn Maker, Collapsible Popcorn Bowls Bpa Free and Dishwasher Safe - 15 Colors Available (AQUA)

features: WHY CHOOSE SILICONE OVER GLASS?: Glass popcorn poppers are fragile, can cause burns and have potential to shatter if dropped. Our silicone Popco popcorn popper bowls come with a lid and convenient, built-in handles. The bowl is uniquely designed to spread the heat evenly so you will get delicious popcorn with very few, if any unpopped kernels. Our Popco popcorn poppers are kid and family friendly; made with heat resistant, non breakable, food-grade silicone.

TASTY POPCORN IN MINUTES: Just pour popcorn kernels into the bowl, add oil, salt and flavorings according to your taste, and put it in the microwave! Popco's large bowl can hold up to 15 cups of popcorn so you can make crisp, tasty popcorn for all your family and friends in just a few minutes!

TOXIN FREE: Now you can stop using potentially, unhealthy popcorn microwave bags! Popco is made of highly durable, heat resistant, BPA free and PVC free silicone so you can be sure it is the best choice for you and your family. With Popco you can use little or no oil and get natural, tasty popcorn everytime!
EASY TO STORE AND CLEAN: Popco has a space saving collapsible design - 2.3 inch collapsed height, for easy and compact storage. It can easily be washed by hand or in a dishwasher.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEE: If for any reason you are not fully satisfied with our product, you will receive a full refund.

The bowl is uniquely designed to spread the heat evenly so you will get delicious popcorn with very few if any unpopped kernels.

TASTY POPCORN IN MINUTES Just pour popcorn kernels to the bowl, add oil, salt, and flavorings according to your taste and put it in the microwave! POPCO big-size bowl can hold up to 15 cups of popcorn so you can make crisp tasty popcorn for all your family and friends in just a few minutes!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use and makes great popcorn!
reviews.reviewText: I have always used an air popper to try to keep my popcorn snacks a little healthier. Most of the time it comes out tasting like cardboard but it is healthier! I had several people recommend this so I decided to try it. It is awesome! I have not tried it using oil. I put the kernels in to the appropriate line and add a little spray butter. I fill it to just above the first line and it pops a full bowl of popcorn. I usually set the microwave for 4 minutes and then stop it when the popping has almost stopped. Leaving it on for too long burns the popcorn. Be sure to put the lid on loosely so it can rise up with the popcorn. Cleans up super easy and folds relatively flat for easy storage. Great for a quick and healthy snack!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Delicious popcorn, easy to use and clean, folds flat for storage; takes up much less room than any other type of popper.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super easy to use
reviews.reviewText: This popcorn popper is so easy to use! It also washes wonderfully in the dishwasher. I use the Dutchman butter oil (that I purchased on amazon) and Orville R popcorn kernels. One thing that I have noticed that will cause the kernels to NOT pop successfully is if I actually mix the oil & kernels in bottom before popping. For some reason the amount of unpopped kernels if they are mixed with the oil will increase greatly . So I pour a bit of oil in the bottom of the bowl and then pour kernels on top and don't mix. Simply place the top on the bowl and place in microwave. This is definitely better popcorn than the microwave bags. I recommend this popper!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Pops almost every kernel.
reviews.reviewText: I can make as little or as much as I want. My popcorn is light and plain no butter or salt how I like it. I can travel with it. It folds down flat. Washes well, no stains.So far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great…now I eat too much popcorn
reviews.reviewText: This works great. I’ve always made popcorn in a pot on the stovetop. Love popcorn, hate the cleanup.With this, it’s super easy to make and can be thrown in the dishwasher. In addition, the silicone stays warm for a while so it can keep your popcorn warm if you like.My only complaint is that now I eat way too much popcorn!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best popcorn popper ever
reviews.reviewText: I was trying to get away from store bought microwave popcorn because of all the ingredients in it. I was using a paper bag to make popcorn, but it was very messy. I saw the reviews for this product, and it was reasonably priced. It turned out to be the best microwave popcorn popper for me. Easy to clean, has two levels of finished product and it folds up for easy storage. Will never need another popper. It is made of silicone so it can take the heat and doesn't lose its shape.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works GREAT! (2 minutes 45 seconds) in my microwave!
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use. Just add (3-4) tablespoons of popcorn kernels to the bowl. No oil needed. (My dad uses a bit of oil in his popper). My parents got one too. They liked mine so well. I bought the aqua. They bought the royal blue. Both are great.I add a bit of "I Can't Believe It's Not Butter Spray" to the finished popcorn in a glass or stainless bowl. I also add parmesan cheese and/or Everything Bagel Seasoning. You can add any seasoning you like: chili lime, ranch, etc.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The most awesome product ever.
reviews.reviewText: I thought that I wrote a review for this, but I couldn't find it. This is by far the best popcorn popper ever invented. I tried the glass ones, and they are plain terrible and always leave a huge amount of kernels unpopped. I bought the teal color silicone popper. It's such a nice color. I have a 700 Watt microwave that is 13 years old, and I just put the popcorn in for 4 minutes and then listen to the sound. Once the popcorn stops popping, I take it out before it starts to burn. Usually, it takes around 3 minutes for all the popcorn to pop, but the time varies so that's why I just put it in 4 minutes and stop it early. Unlike the glass popcorn poppers, you don't have a small opening to reach in and grab popcorn to eat. You don't have to transfer the popcorn to a bowl. You don't have to worry about glass being hot or glass accidentally shattering. The silicone is a lot lighter than the glass. It's way easier and quicker to clean. I really can't think of anything bad about this popper. It's perfect. I did burn one popcorn once inside and it left a burn mark that I couldn't fully remove, but that doesn't bother me. So don't leave your popcorn in the microwave too long. It's not that hard to check on it after three minutes and take it out when it is done popping. The lid is a clear plastic and it discolors easily and I often see beads of sweat or something on it after I am done popping. I think maybe the lid is the weakest part of this popper. I hope it's BPA free or whatever and I think they could make a better looking lid. But even if they didn't, I freaking love this popper!

After reading previous reviews of this silicone microwave popcorn popper, I thought it would take a few tries to get the popcorn just right. The first time I used it I followed the instructions to use the popcorn setting on my microwave. It worked well, but stopped while the kernels were still in the crazy popping stage and I had to add more time. The next time, I just set the dial to high and waited until there were 3-4 seconds between pops. Easy peasy. I didn't use any oil, and the popcorn turned out delicious. I was glad I could control how much (or little) butter and salt to add. The popper cleans easily and because it collapses, it takes up very little room in the cupboard. I'm very happy with this purchase.

reviews.reviewTitle: Yummy popcorn made quick and easy
reviews.reviewText: Haven't added butter straight to the bowl because I had read someone say it had caused problems. Luckily my child loves his popcorn with just a little salt so this is perfect. Really does a great job of cooking popcorn, cleans easy and once dry can be folded for easy storage, way easier to store than the electric popcorn maker I was thinking of getting!

I really enjoy my popcorn popper so far. I wanted to replace my chip addiction with something healthier and cheaper so I decided to eat popcorn when the cravings hit. But taking out a sauce pan and turning on the stove all the time is such a hassle. Then I searched and found this small gadget.It’s amazing how almost each of corns pop. They are really puffy and crunchy. I don’t put oil so there is minimal cleaning as well. Add a bit of salt and you are good to go. Just make sure folloe the instructions on the leaflet so you don’t put more than what’s recommended otherwise they won’t pop fully.I bought high quality organic kernels and I only had 2-3 unpopped one in each batch.Still it comes much more cheaper than a bag of high quality chips.Highly recommended for anyone looking for a fuss free healthy snack.

This popcorn popper is the best one I have used. It’s better than the hot air popper I used to use. It does not require any oil to pop the corn. Just fill the kernels to the fill line then set your microwave to 2.5 minutes (or whatever time works for your microwave) and that is it! I use Orville Redenbocker popcorn and every kernel is popped. Easy and fast. No greasy mess to clean up. Done! Where has this been?! 🙌🏻

reviews.reviewTitle: Gets the job done without fail
reviews.reviewText: Easy to clean and works well. No complaints.
